name: Red Bull
description: The iconic energy drink known for its smooth taste and moderate caffeine hit. Still going strong since the 80s.

name: Monster Energy
description: A bold drink with a punchy flavor and iconic green claw branding. Huge variety of flavors available.

name: Vault
description: A citrus soda-energy hybrid discontinued in 2011. Cult classic with a niche fan base.

name: Rockstar Original
description: Designed for active lifestyles. Has evolved through rebrands but still loved by many.

name: Bang Star Blast
description: Sugar-free and packed with super creatine. Popular among gym-goers and caffeine lovers.
